Package cinvestav.android.pki.cryptography.utils

Interface Summary
IAsymmetricCryptoUtils  
IDigestCryptoUtils Interface for Digest functions, contains common functions for create digest using different algorithms
IKeyStoreUtils  
IPGPUtils Interface for PGP Utils, contains common functions for PGP compatibility
ISymmetricCryptoUtils  
IX509Utils Interface for X509 Certiticate Utils, contains common functions for x509 and CRLs certificate
 

Class Summary
AsymmetricCryptoUtils  
CryptoUtils  
DigestCryptoUtils  
KeyStoreUtil  
PGPUtils Implementation of the Interface IPGPUtils, this class will contain several functions to manage the compatibility with pgp for saving keys, encrypt/decrypt and sing/verify files and byte streams
SymmetricCryptoUtils  
X509Utils  
X509UtilsDictionary This class only contains static attributes that are useful for X509Utils class
